description: The Trango Tech GTX is a seamless, low profile mountaineering boot ideal for technical mountain terrain and climbing easier graded routes. They bridge the gap between mountaineering and backpacking while offering semi-automatic crampon compatibility. Mountain guides, SAR teams, hikers and backpackers alike will benefit from the performance. Users can confidently tackle all types of terrain and know they will be dry and protected during long days in the mountains.
name: La Sportiva Trango Tech GTX - Mens
